entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
